fields.name: SID
fields.help: ID of the set to which user-defined loading will be applied. Set type depends on the type of loading, see LTYPE.

fields.name: LCID
fields.help: Load curve, a function of time. Its current value, crv, is passed to user subroutine LOADSETUD.

fields.name: CID
fields.help: Optional coordinate system along which scale factors SFi is defined. Global system is the default system.

fields.name: SF1
fields.help: Scale factor of loading magnitude, when LTYPE

fields.name: SF2
fields.help: Scale factor of loading magnitude, when LTYPE

fields.name: SF3
fields.help: Scale factor of loading magnitude, when LTYPE

fields.name: IDULS
fields.help: Each USER_LOADING_SET can be assigned a unique ID, which is passed to user subroutine LOADSETUD and allows multiple loading definitions by using a single user subroutine, LOADSETUD. If no value is input, LS-DYNA will assign a sequence number to each USER_LOADING_SET based on its definition sequence.
